name: Fallen Kingdom: Legend of Squirrel
description:
Lighthearted exploration platformer where everything is falling and you must play your panflute to calm your squirrel-kind and get to the "bottom" of things.

Created for the 2018 Wolverine Soft Pumpkin Jam by:

  • Joe Macek
  • Amber Renton
  • Rachel Liu
  • Huzefa Taher
  • Deeya Chaturvedi
